summary: Canary Consumer Acceptance of Toyfoundry exports with schema/DQ checks and monitoring.

directives.details: Ingest composite_export.json and composite_export.csv from canary; record counts and sha256 verification.
Confirm schema_version v1.0; validate field set, types, nullability, and enumerations (ritual/status).
Run non_empty, allowed_rituals, allowed_status, units_positive, duration_ms_range checks; summarize failures.
Enable lightweight monitoring/alerts for ingestion failure or schema drift; define thresholds and remediation.
Provide Go/No-Go with metrics, confirmed schema version, constraints; submit ack + report to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-015-report.json.
